item.title: JuliaSmoothOptimizers.github.io is now JSO.dev
item.description: We are thrilled to announce a significant milestone in the journey of JuliaSmoothOptimizers (JSO) - a rebranding that brings with it a new domain and a fresh identity. We are excited to share that our organization has transitioned from juliasmoothoptimizers.github.io to the snappy and developer-focused jso.dev! This change not only aligns perfectly with our organization's goals but also enhances our branding and community engagement. In this blog post, we delve into the reasons behind this change, the process of execution, and the bright future that lies ahead.

item.title: Conference: JuliaSmoothOptimizers at JuliaCon 2022
item.description: This year's JuliaCon 2022/JuMP-dev 2022 featured three talks on JuliaSmoothOptimizers.

item.title: Moving our site
item.description: The Julia Smooth Optimizers organization has moved to this new website, where we will aggregate all our tutorials and news.

item.title: New package: DCISolver.jl
item.description: We are very happy to announce the publication in the Journal of Open Source Software of the paper DCISolver.jl: A Julia Solver for Nonlinear Optimization using Dynamic Control of Infeasibility.

item.title: Julia Smooth Optimizers @ JuliaCon Local Eindhoven 2023
item.description: Abel Siqueira gave a talk at the first edition of the JuliaCon Local at Eindhoven 2023.

item.title: JuliaSmoothOptimizers is a community partner of JuliaCon Local Eindhoven 2023
item.description: The JuliaCon Local Eindhoven 2023 happens on 01/December/2023, and JSO is happy to be part of their community partners. We will be present at the event.

item.title: Optimization Days 2023 at HEC Montréal: Numerical Optimization and Linear Algebra with Julia
item.description: For the second year, we organized a stream of sessions on "Numerical optimization and linear algebra with Julia" at Optimization Days 2023, held at HEC Montréal, May 29-31, 2023.

item.title: Abel Soares Siqueira on Inspiring Computing Podcast
item.description: Abel Soares Siqueira discusses Julia Smooth Optimizers on the Inspiring Computing podcast.

item.title: New publication about PDENLPModels.jl
item.description: We are very happy to announce the publication in the Journal of Open Source Software of the paper PDENLPModels.jl: A NLPModel API for optimization problems with PDE-constraints.

item.title: Exploring Parallel Computing and GPU Programming with Julia
item.description: GERAD Workshop: Exploring Parallel Computing and GPU Programming with Julia.

item.title: Conference: JuliaSmoothOptimizers at Optimization Days Montréal
item.description: We organized a steam of sessions on ’’Numerical optimization and linear algebra with Julia’’ at Optimization Days 2022, held at HEC Montréal, May 16-18, 2022.

item.title: Krylov.jl: Elevating JuliaSmoothOptimizers to New Heights!
item.description: The Krylov.jl paper by Alexis Montoison and Dominique Orban has been published in JOSS.

item.title: Julia Smooth Optimizers @ JuliaCon 2023
item.description: The JuliaCon 2023 talk about Julia Smooth Optimizers is up on YouTube. Check the latest updates of the packages given by Tangi Migot.
